languages.text: The wearer gains an additional +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} for each consecutive {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} that the wearer has not spent {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. Stacks up to 5 times.

traits.locale_text: The wearer gains an additional +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} for each consecutive turn that the wearer has not spent {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. Stacks up to 5 times.

The wearer gains an additional +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} for each consecutive {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} that the wearer has not spent {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. Stacks up to 5 times.

languages.text: 装备者每有一个连续{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}未消耗任何{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，就会额外获得1点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。最多叠加5层。
languages.original_text: The wearer gains an additional +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} for each consecutive {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} that the wearer has not spent {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. Stacks up to 5 times.

traits.locale_text: 装备者每有一个连续回合未消耗任何{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，就会额外获得1点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。最多叠加5层。

languages.text: Персонаж получает +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} за каждый следующий подряд {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, когда он не тратил {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}. Эффект суммируется до 5 раз.
languages.original_text: The wearer gains an additional +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} for each consecutive {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} that the wearer has not spent {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. Stacks up to 5 times.

traits.locale_text: Персонаж получает +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} за каждый следующий подряд ход, когда он не тратил {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}. Эффект суммируется до 5 раз.
Персонаж получает +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} за каждый следующий подряд ход, когда он не тратил {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}. Эффект суммируется до 5 раз.

languages.text: 使用者は{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を使用しなかった連続{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}で追加{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}を+1を得る。最大5回スタックする。
languages.original_text: The wearer gains an additional +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} for each consecutive {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} that the wearer has not spent {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. Stacks up to 5 times.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を使用しないターンが連続する度、追加の{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}+1最大5回累積できる。

languages.text: El portador gana +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} adicional por cada {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} consecutivo en el que no gaste {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}. Este efecto se acumula un máximo de 5 veces.
languages.original_text: The wearer gains an additional +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} for each consecutive {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} that the wearer has not spent {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. Stacks up to 5 times.

traits.locale_text: El portador gana +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} adicional por cada turno consecutivo en el que no gaste {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}. Este efecto se acumula un máximo de 5 veces.

languages.text: Der Träger erhält zusätzlich +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} für jeden aufeinanderfolgenden {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g}, in dem der Träger keine {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} verbraucht. Addiert sich bis zu 5-mal.
languages.original_text: The wearer gains an additional +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} for each consecutive {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} that the wearer has not spent {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. Stacks up to 5 times.

traits.locale_text: Der Träger erhält zusätzlich +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} für jeden aufeinanderfolgenden Zug, in dem der Träger keine {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} verbraucht. Addiert sich bis zu 5-mal.

languages.text: L'utilisateur bénéficie de +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} supplémentaire pour chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} consécutif sans dépense de {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g}. Cumulable 5 fois.
languages.original_text: The wearer gains an additional +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} for each consecutive {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} that the wearer has not spent {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. Stacks up to 5 times.

traits.locale_text: L'utilisateur bénéficie de +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} supplémentaire pour chaque tour consécutif sans dépense de {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g}. Cumulable 5 fois.
